name: ALONE (itch) (NISHAD)
description:
A story mode Horror ( 3D First Person Game ) where you need to solve  puzzles, explorer the house and leave the house as fast as possible.

Story : You where live alone at home when you sleeping you feel that something is here and you're trying to leave the house.

    

any kind of bugs and other error please report me through Email.
